code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmailComposer=_ref=>{let{initialData,onSend,onCancel}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState(initialData||{to:'',subject:'',body:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSend(formData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email-composer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:initialData?'Voir l\'email':'Composer un nouvel email'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"to",children:"Destinataire"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"to",name:"to",value:formData.to,onChange:handleChange,required:true,disabled:initialData})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"subject",children:"Objet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"subject",name:"subject",value:formData.subject,onChange:handleChange,required:true,disabled:initialData})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"body",children:"Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"body",name:"body",value:formData.body,onChange:handleChange,rows:"10",required:true,disabled:initialData})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-actions",children:[!initialData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"send-btn",children:"Envoyer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"cancel-btn",onClick:onCancel,children:initialData?'Fermer':'Annuler'})]})]})]});};export default EmailComposer;
